name: Lirica
slogan: Learn languages through the power of music
description: An app on which language learners engage and interact with the language using the lyrics of an array of popular songs

team.name: Conor Fitzpatrick
team.bioHtml: Marketing and Content Manager at Lirica

jobs.title: Language Content Creation Intern
jobs.description:
Lirica intro

Lirica is the app that harnesses the emotive power of music to teach foreign languages. Named by Google as one of its best apps of 2018, Lirica is currently in a growth phase and is therefore looking for interns to  create language learning content for its Spanish and upcoming English, French and German products.

The job

The ideal candidate has a strong command of the target language, and ideally is pursuing language studies at university level, and/or has language teaching experience.

The work will consist of the creation of language lessons based on song lyrics. This requires a thorough understanding of how to effectively teach language and a degree of creativity and imagination. It will be important to keep the learner’s experience in mind in the content creation process, making sure that exercises are both engaging and educational.

What you will get

- remuneration based on amount of content delivered
- experience in a dynamic startup environment
- the opportunity to contribute to Lirica’s users’ learning journey
